profile.bio: A generic user looking for a routine.

message: I don't know what to do during warm up
expected_response_guidance: Guide user to create a more concrete and actionable routine description
encourage based on profile and update profile

message: I'm Sarah, 35, software engineer. I love reading & hiking. Been feeling kinda overwhelmed lately with work, want to start a better morning routine to get my day going with more energy. I have iron deficiency
expected_response_guidance: the agent should update the profile correctly

message: I wake up at 7am, brush teeth and wash face. Then I drink a glass of water. Around 7:30 I go for a 30 min jog. Shower at 8:15. Breakfast at 8:45, usually oatmeal. Start work at 9:30.
expected_response_guidance: extract routine items from the message and add them
